root.name: TV Superstars
root.description: Overview TV Superstars starts off by using the PlayStation Eye to capture an image of your face to place it on your in-game avatar. Then, using the PlayStation Move controller, you compete in 5 different mini-games to earn Fame Points. Games Lets Get PhysicalThis is a big game show environment consisting of physical challenges, such as a giant spinning wheel and a human catapult. Frockstar Players must perform in a fashion runway show, first by selecting clothing and make-up, and then strutting down the cat walk. Big Beat KitchenThis is a cooking show with a hip hop theme. Players must follow along with the recipe directions that host Big Chili D puts forward, as well as rap along with the hip hop lyrics. DIY RawPlayers participate in a home improvement show, where they cut wood, arrange furniture, and paint walls. Super Television Acting Agency At this point you're on your way to becoming a TV star, so you'll be participating in commercials and advertisements. Follow along with the director's instructions during your TV commercial shoot to sell your products.
